question: Which highly anticipated science fiction blockbuster, released in March 2024, has garnered significant critical acclaim and box office success, positioning it as an early frontrunner for technical and potentially Best Picture nominations at the 97th Academy Awards (Oscars 2025)?
options: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes

question: Released in Summer 2024, this animated sequel has received widespread praise for its emotional depth and originality, making it a strong contender for Best Animated Feature at the upcoming 97th Academy Awards. Which film is it?

Todd Phillips' *Joker: Folie à Deux*, the sequel to the Oscar-winning 2019 film, is slated for release in October 2024. Which global music superstar joins Joaquin Phoenix in a prominent role, adding a musical dimension to this highly anticipated film?

The first part of a highly anticipated two-part musical adaptation is set for a November 2024 release. Starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, this film is expected to be a major contender at the Oscars 2025 in categories like Production Design, Costume Design, and Original Song. Which musical is it?

Despite a modest box office performance, *Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga*, released in May 2024, received widespread critical acclaim for its stunning action choreography, immersive world-building, and visual effects. Which two Oscar categories is this George Miller-directed prequel most likely to contend for at the 97th Academy Awards?
options: Best Original Score & Best Original Song
Best Visual Effects & Best Production Design
answer: Best Visual Effects & Best Production Design

question: Which film took home the coveted Best Picture award at the 96th Academy Awards ceremony in March 2024?
Emma Stone won her second Best Actress Oscar at the 96th Academy Awards for her transformative performance in which unique film?

Denis Villeneuve's critically and commercially successful sci-fi epic, released in early 2024, is widely considered a strong contender for technical and possibly major categories at the 2025 Academy Awards. What is the title of this film?
options: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes

question: Which highly anticipated musical sequel, starring Lady Gaga and Joaquin Phoenix, is set to be released in October 2024 and is expected to be a major awards season contender for the 2025 Oscars?
Which animated feature, a sequel to a beloved Pixar film, became a significant box office success in mid-2024 and is expected to be a frontrunner for Best Animated Feature at the 2025 Oscars?
Which film received the most Academy Awards at the 96th Oscars ceremony in March 2024, including Best Picture?
Emma Stone won her second Best Actress Oscar at the 96th Academy Awards for her lead role in which critically acclaimed film, directed by Yorgos Lanthimos?

Which highly anticipated musical fantasy film, an adaptation of the first part of the iconic Broadway show and starring Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, is slated for release in November 2024 and is expected to be a major contender for the 2025 Oscars?

At the 96th Academy Awards, Billie Eilish and Finneas O'Connell won their second Oscar for Best Original Song for 'What Was I Made For?'. From which major 2023 blockbuster film was this song featured?

Which upcoming historical epic, directed by Ridley Scott and a sequel to a Best Picture-winning film from 2000, stars Paul Mescal and Denzel Washington and is scheduled for a November 2024 release, generating early Oscar buzz for the 2025 ceremony?
options: Kingdom of the Planet of the Apes
